summary: On or about January 31, 2013, Frontier discovered that a malicious person had added a file to a computer server that hosts the Websites.  As a result of the modification, from September 14, 2012 to January 31, 2013, the malicious person was able to gain access to the server and intercept certain personal information as it was inputted by users making purchase at the Websites, and obtain access to a customer database residing on the server.  We believe that your personal information could have been taken as a result of this incident, including name, address, city, state, telephone, username, password and payment card information, including card number, expiration date, and security codes (CVV2/CVC2/CID).  Please be aware that a small number o the Website's users have told us that their payment cards were used for fraudulent transactions after visiting the Websites during that timeframe.  The Websites include:  wuracacia.com, simplyorganic.com, frontier coop.com and wholesale.frontiercoop.com.
